Both languages ensure compliance with LinkedIn's terms of service and API usage policies to avoid legal issues.

title: CodeIgniter Migration to PHP 7
overview: CodeIgniter Migration to PHP 7 involves upgrading a legacy CodeIgniter application from older PHP versions (e.g., PHP 5.x) to PHP 7.x to leverage improved performance, security, and modern features. This process includes reviewing the existing codebase, updating configuration files (e.g., database.php, config.php), and ensuring compatibility with PHP 7’s syntax and extensions (e.g., mbstring, curl). It may require refactoring deprecated functions, testing thoroughly, and optionally migrating to a newer CodeIgniter version (e.g., 3.x or 4.x) for better PHP 7 support.
responsibilities: Assessment of the outdated CodeIgniter site
Transition to PHP 7
Testing and ensuring functionality and integrity of the upgraded site
achievements: Successfully completed the PHP 7 upgrade within the stipulated timeframe

title: Node.js & Python Full Stack Project
overview: A full-stack web application integrating Node.js for the frontend/backend server and Python for data processing or ML tasks. Node.js handles routing, APIs, and real-time features using Express and Socket.io. Python (via Flask/FastAPI) manages computation-heavy tasks, exposed through RESTful services. The stack leverages MongoDB/PostgreSQL, ensuring scalable and data-driven performance.

heading: General Project

title: Discord Bot for NFT
overview: This project involved developing a specialized Discord bot designed to integrate with NFT marketplaces and provide real-time pricing and collection data within Discord server environments. The bot implementation focused on API connectivity with platforms like OpenSea to fetch current market information, track price movements, and display NFT collection statistics for community members. The solution included customizable tracking features that allowed users to monitor specific NFT collections and receive automated updates about price changes and market trends. The project emphasized creating an intuitive user interface within Discord's chat environment while maintaining reliable data accuracy and responsive performance for NFT community engagement.
responsibilities: Fetching NFT data from OpenSea
Displaying current prices of NFTs in Discord channels
Tracking and displaying the price history of NFTs
Customizing the bot to track specific NFT collections
achievements: Keep track of the price of your favorite NFTs
See how the price of NFTs has changed over time
Make informed decisions about when to buy or sell NFTs
Stay up-to-date on the latest NFT trends
description: This Discord bot fetches NFT data from OpenSea and displays it in Discord channels. It allows users to specify NFT collections for tracking and shows the current price and price history of each NFT.
heading: General Project

title: Actuary Chatbot
overview: This project involved developing an AI-powered chatbot specifically designed for the actuarial profession, built using Next.js framework and trained on extensive actuarial datasets. The implementation included training the model on approximately 960,000 data embeddings with 300 tokens per line, focusing on actuarial-specific knowledge and industry terminology. The solution featured a comprehensive chat interface with capabilities similar to ChatGPT but specialized for actuarial queries, including multi-chat functionality, light/dark mode options, and PDF sharing capabilities. The project emphasized creating an intuitive user experience for actuarial professionals while maintaining accurate, domain-specific responses through specialized training data and custom interface design.
achievements: Trained on personal data of actuary.
Trained on 9.6 lac sentences.
Functions similar to ChatGPT.
Features a better interface.
Allows users to create new chats.
client_feedback: User feedback is actively monitored. No significant issues reported.

Trained on 9.6 lac sentences. Use it similarly to ChatGPT with a better interface. Create a new chat.

title: SMS Discord Bot
overview: The SMS Discord Bot is an advanced automation solution designed to streamline server management and facilitate seamless communication on the Discord platform.

Leveraging the power of Python, API calling, scripting, and file I/O operations, this bot offers a wide range of features, including port switching, ICCID data retrieval, server reset/restart, slash commands, CSV data generation, and a versatile file management system.
responsibilities: Designed, implemented, and maintained the SMS Discord Bot.
Integrated API calls for port switching, ICCID data retrieval, and server management.
Implemented slash commands for user-friendly interactions.
Developed a robust file system for efficient data handling.
Created a CSV generation mechanism for easy analysis and reporting.
Ensured secure server credential management.
achievements: Specific achievements were not provided
client_feedback: Initial client feedback has been positive, emphasizing the SMS Discord Bot's effectiveness in simplifying server management tasks, providing quick access to vital information, and offering a user-friendly interface through slash commands. Clients appreciate the bot's versatility and reliability in handling complex tasks effortlessly.

title: Incogniton MultiProfiles Facebook Messenger Bot
overview: The Incogniton MultiProfiles Facebook Messenger Bot is a robust automation tool designed to enhance user engagement and streamline interactions on the Facebook platform.This multifunctional bot employs a combination of Python, Selenium, Incogniton API calling, and Google Sheets integration to efficiently manage various tasks, ensuring a seamless communication experience.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the Facebook Messenger bot with a focus on integrating diverse functionalities.
Managed data flow between Google Sheets and the bot for dynamic and customizable data retrieval.
Implemented marketplace status checks and ensured effective communication through keyword analysis and timely responses.
Developed logging mechanisms and profile health tracking for comprehensive performance analytics.
achievements: Specific achievements were not provided
client_feedback: Client feedback has been positive, highlighting the bot's efficiency in managing conversations, automating responses, and providing valuable insights through comprehensive logging and profiling.
